# Delete a custom event or a custom scheduled event

Learn how to delete a custom event or a custom scheduled event in the Zuora UI.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation menu.
2.  Click the Custom Events tab.
3.  Click the more options icon ![More action icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9d293d31-4491-421c-b4d6-f5a49e5f13c3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..TA5-R0Mzp6WAcQSdzB-t8tVoDVv_iYRtLahEbOMQEqI) to the right of an event.
4.  Click Delete.
5.  Click Delete in the confirmation dialog.
